OnlyLive.label: Only when live
OnlyLive.tooltip: Command is only active when stream is live

Command.label: Command Name
Command.tooltip: The command the bot will respond to

Permission.label: Permission level
Permission.tooltip: Set the permission level for the command

PermissionInfo.label: Permission level info
PermissionInfo.tooltip: Set the user, rank or tier for permission

Usage.label: Usage
Usage.tooltip: Usage for where the script can be used!

UserCooldown.label: User Cooldown (seconds)
UserCooldown.tooltip: User cooldown in seconds. (Default is 86400s = 24 h)

OnUserCooldown.value: {0} the command is still on user cooldown for {1} hours!
OnUserCooldown.label: User Cooldown Response
OnUserCooldown.tooltip:
The message that the bot will display when the command is on user cooldown. 
 {0} = user 
 {1} = time remaining

OnUserCooldownMinute.value: {0} the command is still on user cooldown for {1} minutes!
OnUserCooldownMinute.label: User Cooldown Response minutes
OnUserCooldownMinute.tooltip:
The message that the bot will display when the command is on user cooldown. 
 {0} = user 
 {1} = time remaining

ResponseMessage.value: {0} ich schenke dir {1} {2}! Du hast also {3} {2}!
ResponseMessage.label: Response message
ResponseMessage.tooltip:
The message that the bot will display when the command has been executed. 
 {0} = user 
 {1} = dailyrewards 
 {2} = currency 
 {3} = UserAccountpoints

Timeout.label: Timeout users who fail
Timeout.tooltip: If enabled viewers that tries to fish and fail will get timed out. Only available for Twitch

TL.label: Timeout length
TL.tooltip: Length for the timeout if users fail to fish

DailyRewards.label: Daily Rewards
DailyRewards.tooltip: How much should the command bring?

BtnDefaults.label: Restore Default Settings
BtnDefaults.tooltip:
Reset settings back to defaults.
Reload Scripts afterwards to see the changes in the user interface!
